long_description:
Inputs
------
default: DataContainer
    Any DataContainer - likely connected to the output of the OPEN_SERIAL node.
short_description: The IDN node queries a device's identity through the universal *IDN? SCPI command.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open connection with the device receiving the *IDN? SCPI command.

returns.description: The result of the *IDN? SCPI command.
